   19: %%
   20: -module(filename_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   22: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   23: -export([absname/1, absname_2/1, 
   24: 	 basename_1/1, basename_2/1,
   25: 	 dirname/1, extension/1, join/1, t_nativename/1]).
   26: -export([pathtype/1,rootname/1,split/1]).
   27: -export([absname_bin/1, absname_bin_2/1, 
   28: 	 basename_bin_1/1, basename_bin_2/1,
   29: 	 dirname_bin/1, extension_bin/1, join_bin/1, t_nativename_bin/1]).
   30: -export([pathtype_bin/1,rootname_bin/1,split_bin/1]).
   31: -export([t_basedir_api/1, t_basedir_xdg/1, t_basedir_windows/1]).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: 
   35: suite() ->
   36:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   37:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   38: 
   39: all() -> 
   40:     [absname, absname_2,
   41:      absname_bin, absname_bin_2,
   42:      {group,p},
   43:      t_basedir_xdg, t_basedir_windows].
   44: 
   45: groups() -> 
   46:     [{p, [parallel],
   47:       [dirname,
   48:        extension, extension_bin,
   49:        join, pathtype, rootname, split, t_nativename,
   50:        basename_1, basename_2,
   51:        basename_bin_1, basename_bin_2, dirname_bin,
   52:        join_bin, pathtype_bin, rootname_bin, split_bin,
   53:        t_nativename_bin,
   54:        t_basedir_api]}].
   55: 
   56: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: 
   69: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   70: 
   71: absname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   72:     case os:type() of
   73:         {win32, _} -> 
   74:             [Drive|_] = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   75:             Temp = filename:join([Drive|":/"], "temp"),
   76:             case file:make_dir(Temp) of
   77:                 ok -> ok;
   78:                 {error,eexist} -> ok
   79:             end,
   80:             {ok,Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
   81:             ok = file:set_cwd(Temp),
   82:             [Drive|":/temp/foo"] = filename:absname(foo),
   83:             [Drive|":/temp/foo"] = filename:absname("foo"),
   84:             [Drive|":/temp/../ebin"] = filename:absname("../ebin"),
   85:             [Drive|":/erlang"] = filename:absname("/erlang"),
   86:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("/erlang/src"),
   87:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("\\erlang\\src"),
   88:             [Drive|":/temp/erlang"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang"]),
   89:             [Drive|":/temp/erlang/src"] =
   90:                 filename:absname([Drive|":erlang/src"]),
   91:             [Drive|":/temp/erlang/src"] =
   92:                 filename:absname([Drive|":erlang\\src\\"]),
   93:             "a:/erlang" = filename:absname("a:erlang"),
   94: 
   95:             file:set_cwd([Drive|":/"]),
   96:             [Drive|":/foo"] = filename:absname(foo),
   97:             [Drive|":/foo"] = filename:absname("foo"),
   98:             [Drive|":/../ebin"] = filename:absname("../ebin"),
   99:             [Drive|":/erlang"] = filename:absname("/erlang"),
  100:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("/erlang/src"),
  101:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname(["/erlang",'/src']),
  102:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("\\erlang\\\\src"),
  103:             [Drive|":/erlang"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang"]),
  104:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang/src"]),
  105:             "a:/erlang" = filename:absname("a:erlang"),
  106: 
  107:             "//foo" = filename:absname("//foo"),
  108:             "//foo/bar" = filename:absname("//foo/bar"),
  109:             "//foo/\bar" = filename:absname("//foo/\bar"),
  110:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:absname("//foo/bar\\baz"),
  111:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:absname("//foo\\bar/baz"),
  112:             "//foo" = filename:absname("\\\\foo"),
  113:             "//foo/bar" = filename:absname("\\\\foo/bar"),
  114:             "//foo/\bar" = filename:absname("\\\\foo/\bar"),
  115:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:absname("\\\\foo/bar\\baz"),
  116:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:absname("\\\\foo\\bar/baz"),
  117: 
  118:             file:set_cwd(Cwd),
  119:             ok;
  120:         {unix, _} ->
  121:             ok = file:set_cwd("/usr"),
  122:             "/usr/foo" = filename:absname(foo),
  123:             "/usr/foo" = filename:absname("foo"),
  124:             "/usr/../ebin" = filename:absname("../ebin"),
  125: 
  126:             file:set_cwd("/"),
  127:             "/foo" = filename:absname(foo),
  128:             "/foo" = filename:absname("foo"),
  129:             "/../ebin" = filename:absname("../ebin"),
  130:             "/erlang" = filename:absname("/erlang"),
  131:             "/erlang/src" = filename:absname("/erlang/src"),
  132:             "/erlang/src" = filename:absname(["/erl",'ang/s',"rc"]),
  133:             "/erlang/src" = filename:absname(["/erl",'a','ng',"/",'s',"rc"]),
  134:             "/erlang/src" = filename:absname("/erlang///src"),
  135:             "/file_sorter.erl" = filename:absname([file_sorter|'.erl']),
  136:             ok
  137:     end.
  138: 
  139: 
  140: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  141: 
  142: absname_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  143:     case os:type() of
  144:         {win32, _} ->
  145:             [Drive|_] = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  146:             [Drive|":/temp/foo"] = filename:absname(foo, [Drive|":/temp"]),
  147:             [Drive|":/temp/foo"] = filename:absname("foo", [Drive|":/temp"]),
  148:             [Drive|":/temp/../ebin"] = filename:absname("../ebin",
  149:                                                         [Drive|":/temp"]),
  150:             [Drive|":/erlang"] = filename:absname("/erlang", [Drive|":/temp"]),
  151:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("/erlang/src",
  152:                                                       [Drive|":/temp"]),
  153:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("\\erlang\\src",
  154:                                                       [Drive|":/temp"]),
  155:             [Drive|":/temp/erlang"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang"],
  156:                                                        [Drive|":/temp"]),
  157:             [Drive|":/temp/erlang/src"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang/src"],
  158:                                                            [Drive|":/temp"]),
  159:             [Drive|":/temp/erlang/src"] =
  160:                 filename:absname([Drive|":erlang\\src\\"], [Drive|":/temp"]),
  161:             "a:/erlang" = filename:absname("a:erlang", [Drive|":/temp"]),
  162: 
  163:             file:set_cwd([Drive|":/"]),
  164:             [Drive|":/foo"] = filename:absname(foo, [Drive|":/"]),
  165:             [Drive|":/foo"] = filename:absname("foo", [Drive|":/"]),
  166:             [Drive|":/../ebin"] = filename:absname("../ebin", [Drive|":/"]),
  167:             [Drive|":/erlang"] = filename:absname("/erlang", [Drive|":/"]),
  168:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("/erlang/src",
  169:                                                       [Drive|":/"]),
  170:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname("\\erlang\\\\src",
  171:                                                       [Drive|":/"]),
  172:             [Drive|":/erlang"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang"],
  173:                                                   [Drive|":/"]),
  174:             [Drive|":/erlang/src"] = filename:absname([Drive|":erlang/src"],
  175:                                                       [Drive|":/"]),
  176:             "a:/erlang" = filename:absname("a:erlang", [Drive|":/"]),
  177: 
  178:             "//foo" = filename:absname("foo","//"),
  179:             "//foo/bar" = filename:absname("foo/bar", "//"),
  180:             "//foo/bar" = filename:absname("bar", "//foo"),
  181:             "//bar" = filename:absname("/bar", "//foo"),
  182:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:absname("bar/baz", "//foo"),
  183:             "//bar/baz" = filename:absname("//bar/baz", "//foo"),
  184:             "//\bar" = filename:absname("/\bar", "//foo"),
  185:             "//foo" = filename:absname("foo","\\\\"),
  186:             "//foo/bar" = filename:absname("foo/bar", "\\\\"),
  187:             "//foo/bar" = filename:absname("bar", "\\\\foo"),
  188:             "//bar" = filename:absname("/bar", "\\\\foo"),
  189:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:absname("bar/baz", "\\\\foo"),
  190:             "//bar/baz" = filename:absname("\\\\bar/baz", "\\\\foo"),
  191:             "//\bar" = filename:absname("/\bar", "\\\\foo"),
  192:             "//bar/baz" = filename:absname("\\\\bar/baz", "//foo"),
  193:             "//bar/baz" = filename:absname("//bar/baz", "\\\\foo"),
  194: 
  195:             ok;
  196:         _ ->
  197:             "/usr/foo" = filename:absname(foo, "/usr"),
  198:             "/usr/foo" = filename:absname("foo", "/usr"),
  199:             "/usr/../ebin" = filename:absname("../ebin", "/usr"),
  200: 
  201:             "/foo" = filename:absname(foo, "/"),
  202:             "/foo" = filename:absname("foo", "/"),
  203:             "/../ebin" = filename:absname("../ebin", "/"),
  204:             "/erlang" = filename:absname("/erlang", "/"),
  205:             "/erlang/src" = filename:absname("/erlang/src", "/"),
  206:             "/erlang/src" = filename:absname("/erlang///src", "/"),
  207:             ok
  208:     end.
  209: 
  210: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  211: 
  212: basename_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     "." = filename:basename("."),
  214:     "foo" = filename:basename("foo"),
  215:     "foo" = filename:basename("/usr/foo"),
  216:     "foo.erl" = filename:basename("A:usr/foo.erl"),
  217:     "foo" = filename:basename('/usr/foo'),
  218:     "foo" = filename:basename(["/usr","/","f","o","o"]),
  219:     "foo" = filename:basename(["/usr/",foo]),
  220:     "foo" = filename:basename(["/usr/f",oo]),
  221:     "foo" = filename:basename(["usr/", "foo"]),
  222:     "foo" = filename:basename(["usr/"|foo]),
  223:     "foo" = filename:basename(["usr/foo/"]),
  224:     case os:type() of
  225:         {win32, _} ->
  226:             "foo" = filename:basename(["usr\\foo\\"]),
  227:             "foo" = filename:basename("A:\\usr\\foo"),
  228:             "foo" = filename:basename("A:foo");
  229:         _ ->
  230:             "strange\\but\\true" =
  231:                 filename:basename("strange\\but\\true")
  232:     end,
  233:     ok.
  234: 
  235: basename_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  236:     "." = filename:basename(".", ".erl"),
  237:     "foo" = filename:basename("foo.erl", ".erl"),
  238:     "foo" = filename:basename('foo.erl', ".erl"),
  239:     "foo" = filename:basename("foo.erl", '.erl'),
  240:     "foo" = filename:basename(["/usr","/","f","oo"], ".erl"),
  241:     "foo.erl" = filename:basename("/usr/foo.erl", ".hrl"),
  242:     "foo.erl" = filename:basename("/usr.hrl/foo.erl", ".hrl"),
  243:     "foo" = filename:basename("/usr.hrl/foo", ".hrl"),
  244:     "foo" = filename:basename("usr/foo/", ".erl"),
  245:     "foo.erl" = filename:basename("usr/foo.erl/", ".erl"),
  246:     "foo.erl" = filename:basename("usr/foo.erl/", '.erl'),
  247:     "foo" = filename:basename(["/usr",'/','f','oo'], ".erl"),
  248:     "foo.erl" = filename:basename(["usr/foo.e",'rl/'], ".erl"),
  249:     case os:type() of
  250:         {win32, _} ->
  251:             "foo" = filename:basename("A:foo", ".erl"),
  252:             "foo.erl" = filename:basename("a:\\usr\\foo.erl", ".hrl"),
  253:             "foo.erl" = filename:basename("c:\\usr.hrl\\foo.erl", ".hrl"),
  254:             "foo" = filename:basename("A:\\usr\\foo", ".hrl");
  255:         _ ->
  256:             "strange\\but\\true" =
  257:                 filename:basename("strange\\but\\true.erl", ".erl"),
  258:             "strange\\but\\true" =
  259:                 filename:basename("strange\\but\\true", ".erl")
  260:     end,
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  264: 
  265: dirname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  266:     case os:type() of
  267:         {win32,_} ->
  268:             "A:/usr" = filename:dirname("A:/usr/foo.erl"),
  269:             "A:usr" = filename:dirname("A:usr/foo.erl"),
  270:             "/usr" = filename:dirname("\\usr\\foo.erl"),
  271:             "/" = filename:dirname("\\usr"),
  272:             "//foo/bar" = filename:dirname("//foo/bar/baz.erl"),
  273:             "//foo/\bar" = filename:dirname("//foo/\bar/baz.erl"),
  274:             "//foo/bar" = filename:dirname("//foo\\bar/baz.erl"),
  275:             "//foo/bar" = filename:dirname("\\\\foo/bar/baz.erl"),
  276:             "//foo/\bar" = filename:dirname("\\\\foo/\bar/baz.erl"),
  277:             "//foo/bar" = filename:dirname("\\\\foo\\bar/baz.erl"),
  278:             "//foo" = filename:dirname("//foo/baz.erl"),
  279:             "//foo" = filename:dirname("//foo/\baz.erl"),
  280:             "//foo" = filename:dirname("//foo\\baz.erl"),
  281:             "//foo" = filename:dirname("\\\\foo/baz.erl"),
  282:             "//foo" = filename:dirname("\\\\foo/\baz.erl"),
  283:             "//foo" = filename:dirname("\\\\foo\\baz.erl"),
  284:             "A:" = filename:dirname("A:");
  285:         _ -> true
  286:     end,
  287:     "usr" = filename:dirname("usr///foo.erl"),
  288:     "." = filename:dirname("foo.erl"),
  289:     "." = filename:dirname("."),
  290:     "usr" = filename:dirname('usr/foo.erl'),
  291:     "usr" = filename:dirname(['usr','/foo.erl']),
  292:     "usr" = filename:dirname(['us','r/foo.erl']),
  293:     "usr" = filename:dirname(['usr/','/foo.erl']),
  294:     "usr" = filename:dirname(['usr/','foo.erl']),
  295:     "usr" = filename:dirname(['usr/'|'foo.erl']),
  296:     "usr" = filename:dirname(['usr/f','oo.erl']),
  297:     "/" = filename:dirname("/"),
  298:     "/" = filename:dirname("/usr"),
  299:     ok.
  300:     
  301: 
  302: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  303: 
  304: extension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  305:     ".erl" = filename:extension("A:/usr/foo.erl"),
  306:     ".erl" = filename:extension("A:/usr/foo.nisse.erl"),
  307:     ".erl" = filename:extension(["A:/usr/", 'foo.ni', "sse.erl"]),
  308:     ".erl" = filename:extension(["A:/usr/", 'foo.ni', "sse.e", 'rl']),
  309:     ".erl" = filename:extension(["A:/usr/", 'foo.ni', "sse.e"|'rl']),
  310:     ".erl" = filename:extension("A:/usr.bar/foo.nisse.erl"),
  311:     "" = filename:extension("A:/usr.bar/foo"),
  312:     "" = filename:extension("A:/usr/foo"),
  313:     "" = filename:extension(".gitignore"),
  314:     "" = filename:extension("A:/usr/.gitignore"),
  315:     ".ignore" = filename:extension("A:/usr/..ignore"),
  316:     ".ignore" = filename:extension("A:/usr/.git.ignore"),
  317:     case os:type() of
  318:         {win32, _} ->
  319:             "" = filename:extension("A:\\usr\\foo"),
  320:             ".erl" = filename:extension("A:/usr.bar/foo.nisse.erl"),
  321:             "" = filename:extension("A:/usr.bar/foo"),
  322:             "" = filename:extension("A:\\usr\\.gitignore"),
  323:             ".ignore" = filename:extension("A:\\usr\\..ignore"),
  324:             ".ignore" = filename:extension("A:\\usr\\.git.ignore"),
  325:             ok;
  326:         _ -> ok
  327:     end.
  328: 
  329: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  330:     
  331: join(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  332:     %% Whenever joining two elements, test the equivalence between
  333:     %% join/1 and join/2 (OTP-12158) by using help function
  334:     %% filename_join/2.
  335:     "/" = filename:join(["/"]),
  336:     "usr/foo.erl" = filename_join("usr","foo.erl"),
  337:     "/src/foo.erl" = filename_join(usr, "/src/foo.erl"),
  338:     "/src/foo.erl" = filename_join("/src/",'foo.erl'),
  339:     "/src/foo.erl" = filename_join(usr, ["/sr", 'c/foo.erl']),
  340:     "/src/foo.erl" = filename_join("usr", "/src/foo.erl"),
  341: 
  342:     %% Make sure that redundant slashes work too.
  343:     "a/b/c/d/e/f/g" = filename:join(["a//b/c/////d//e/f/g"]),
  344:     "a/b/c/d/e/f/g" = filename_join("a//b/c/", "d//e/f/g"),
  345:     "a/b/c/d/e/f/g" = filename_join("a//b/c", "d//e/f/g"),
  346:     "/d/e/f/g" = filename_join("a//b/c", "/d//e/f/g"),
  347: 
  348:     "foo/bar" = filename_join([$f,$o,$o,$/,[]], "bar"),
  349: 
  350:     %% Single dots - should be removed if in the middle of the path,
  351:     %% but not at the end of the path.
  352:     "/." = filename:join(["/."]),
  353:     "/" = filename:join(["/./"]),
  354:     "/." = filename:join(["/./."]),
  355:     "./." = filename:join(["./."]),
  356: 
  357:     "/a/b" = filename_join("/a/.","b"),
  358:     "/a/b/." = filename_join("/a/.","b/."),
  359:     "/a/." = filename_join("/a/.","."),
  360:     "/a/." = filename_join("/a","."),
  361:     "/a/." = filename_join("/a/.",""),
  362:     "./." = filename_join("./.","."),
  363:     "./." = filename_join("./","."),
  364:     "./." = filename_join("./.",""),
  365:     "." = filename_join(".",""),
  366:     "./." = filename_join(".","."),
  367: 
  368:     %% Trailing slash shall be removed - except the root
  369:     "/" = filename:join(["/"]),
  370:     "/" = filename:join(["/./"]),
  371:     "/a" = filename:join(["/a/"]),
  372:     "/b" = filename_join("/a/","/b/"),
  373:     "/a/b" = filename_join("/a/","b/"),
  374: 
  375:     case os:type() of
  376:         {win32, _} ->
  377:             "//" = filename:join(["//"]),
  378:             "d:/" = filename:join(["D:/"]),
  379:             "d:/" = filename:join(["D:\\"]),
  380:             "d:/abc" = filename_join("D:/", "abc"),
  381:             "d:abc" = filename_join("D:", "abc"),
  382:             "a/b/c/d/e/f/g" = filename:join(["a//b\\c//\\/\\d/\\e/f\\g"]),
  383:             "a:usr/foo.erl" = filename:join(["A:","usr","foo.erl"]),
  384:             "/usr/foo.erl" = filename:join(["A:","/usr","foo.erl"]),
  385:             "c:usr" = filename_join("A:","C:usr"),
  386:             "a:usr" = filename_join("A:","usr"),
  387:             "c:/usr" = filename_join("A:", "C:/usr"),
  388:             "c:/usr/foo.erl" = filename:join(["A:","C:/usr","foo.erl"]),
  389:             "c:usr/foo.erl" = filename:join(["A:","C:usr","foo.erl"]),
  390:             "d:/foo" = filename:join([$D, $:, $/, []], "foo"),
  391:             "//" = filename:join("\\\\", ""),
  392:             "//foo" = filename:join("\\\\", "foo"),
  393:             "//foo/bar" = filename:join("\\\\", "foo\\\\bar"),
  394:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo", "bar\\\\baz"),
  395:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo", "bar\\baz"),
  396:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo\\bar", baz),
  397:             "//foo/\bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo/\bar", baz),
  398:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo/bar", baz),
  399:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo", "\\\\bar\\baz"),
  400:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo", "//bar\\baz"),
  401:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo", "//bar/baz"),
  402:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("\\\\foo", "\\\\bar/baz"),
  403:             "//d/e/f/g" = filename:join("a//b/c", "//d//e/f/g"),
  404:             "//" = filename:join("//", ""),
  405:             "//foo" = filename:join("//", "foo"),
  406:             "//foo/bar" = filename:join("//", "foo\\\\bar"),
  407:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo", "bar\\\\baz"),
  408:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo", "bar\\baz"),
  409:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo\\bar", baz),
  410:             "//foo/\bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo/\bar", baz),
  411:             "//foo/bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo/bar", baz),
  412:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo", "\\\\bar\\baz"),
  413:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo", "//bar\\baz"),
  414:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo", "//bar/baz"),
  415:             "//bar/baz" = filename:join("//foo", "\\\\bar/baz"),
  416:             ok;
  417:         _ ->
  418:             "/" = filename:join(["//"]),
  419:             "/d/e/f/g" = filename:join("a//b/c", "//d//e/f/g"),
  420:             ok
  421:     end.
  422: 
  423: %% Make sure join([A,B]) is equivalent to join(A,B) (OTP-12158)
  424: filename_join(A,B) ->
  425:     Res = filename:join(A,B),
  426:     Res = filename:join([A,B]).
  427: 
  428: pathtype(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  429:     relative = filename:pathtype(".."),
  430:     relative = filename:pathtype("foo"),
  431:     relative = filename:pathtype("foo/bar"),
  432:     relative = filename:pathtype('foo/bar'),
  433:     relative = filename:pathtype(['f','oo',"/bar"]),
  434:     case os:type() of
  435:         {win32, _} ->
  436:             volumerelative = filename:pathtype("/usr/local/bin"),
  437:             volumerelative = filename:pathtype("A:usr/local/bin"),
  438:             ok;
  439:         _ ->
  440:             absolute = filename:pathtype("/"),
  441:             absolute = filename:pathtype("/usr/local/bin"),
  442:             ok
  443:     end.
  444: 
  445: rootname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  446:     "/jam.src/kalle" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/kalle"),
  447:     "/jam.src/foo" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/foo.erl"),
  448:     "/jam.src/.gitignore" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/.gitignore"),
  449:     "/jam.src/.git" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/.git.ignore"),
  450:     "/jam.src/." = filename:rootname("/jam.src/..gitignore"),
  451:     "/jam.src/foo" = filename:rootname(["/ja",'m.sr',"c/foo.erl"]),
  452:     "/jam.src/foo" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/foo.erl", ".erl"),
  453:     "/jam.src/.gitignore" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/.gitignore", ".gitignore"),
  454:     "/jam.src/.git" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/.git.ignore", ".ignore"),
  455:     "/jam.src/." = filename:rootname("/jam.src/..gitignore", ".gitignore"),
  456:     "/jam.src/foo.jam" = filename:rootname("/jam.src/foo.jam", ".erl"),
  457:     "/jam.src/foo.jam" = filename:rootname(["/jam.sr",'c/foo.j',"am"],".erl"),
  458:     "/jam.src/foo.jam" = filename:rootname(["/jam.sr",'c/foo.j'|am],".erl"),
  459:     ok.
  460: 
  461: split(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  462:     ["/","usr","local","bin"] = filename:split("/usr/local/bin"),
  463:     ["foo","bar"]= filename:split("foo/bar"),
  464:     ["foo", "bar", "hello"]= filename:split("foo////bar//hello"),
  465:     ["foo", "bar", "hello"]= filename:split(["foo//",'//bar//h',"ello"]),
  466:     ["foo", "bar", "hello"]= filename:split(["foo//",'//bar//h'|ello]),
  467:     ["/"] = filename:split("/"),
  468:     [] = filename:split(""),
  469:     case os:type() of
  470:         {win32,_} ->
  471:             ["a:/","msdev","include"] =
  472:                 filename:split("a:/msdev/include"),
  473:             ["a:/","msdev","include"] =
  474:                 filename:split("A:/msdev/include"),
  475:             ["msdev","include"] =
  476:                 filename:split("msdev\\include"),
  477:             ["a:/","msdev","include"] =
  478:                 filename:split("a:\\msdev\\include"),
  479:             ["a:","msdev","include"] =
  480:                 filename:split("a:msdev\\include"),
  481:             ["//","foo"] =
  482:                 filename:split("\\\\foo"),
  483:             ["//","foo"] =
  484:                 filename:split("//foo"),
  485:             ["//","foo","bar"] =
  486:                 filename:split("\\\\foo\\\\bar"),
  487:             ["//","foo","baz"] =
  488:                 filename:split("\\\\foo\\baz"),
  489:             ["//","foo","baz"] =
  490:                 filename:split("//foo\\baz"),
  491:             ok;
  492:         _ ->
  493: 	    ok
  494:     end.
  495: 
  496: t_nativename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  497:     "abcedf" = filename:nativename(abcedf),
  498:     "abcedf" = filename:nativename(["abc", "edf"]),
  499:     "abcgluff" = filename:nativename(["abc", gluff]),
  500:     case os:type() of
  501:         {win32, _} ->
  502:             "a:\\temp\\arne.exe" =
  503:                 filename:nativename("A:/temp//arne.exe/");
  504:         _ ->
  505:             "/usr/tmp/arne" =
  506:                 filename:nativename("/usr/tmp//arne/")
  507:     end.
  508: 
  509: %%
  510: %%
  511: %% With binaries
  512: %%
  513: %%
  514: 
  515: absname_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  516:     case os:type() of
  517:         {win32, _} -> 
  518:             [Drive|_] = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  519:             Temp = filename:join([Drive|":/"], "temp"),
  520:             case file:make_dir(Temp) of
  521:                 ok -> ok;
  522:                 {error,eexist} -> ok
  523:             end,
  524:             {ok,Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  525:             ok = file:set_cwd(Temp),
  526:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>),
  527:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>),
  528:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang">>),
  529:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang/src">>),
  530:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"\\erlang\\src">>),
  531:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang">>),
  532:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/erlang/src">> =
  533:             filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang/src">>),
  534:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/erlang/src">> =
  535:             filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang\\src\\">>),
  536:             <<"a:/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"a:erlang">>),
  537: 
  538:             file:set_cwd(<<Drive:8,":/">>),
  539:             <<Drive:8,":/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>),
  540:             <<Drive:8,":/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>),
  541:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang">>),
  542:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang/src">>),
  543:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"\\erlang\\\\src">>),
  544:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang">>),
  545:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang/src">>),
  546:             <<"a:/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"a:erlang">>),
  547: 
  548:             file:set_cwd(Cwd),
  549:             ok;
  550:         {unix,_} ->
  551:             ok = file:set_cwd(<<"/usr">>),
  552:             <<"/usr/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>),
  553:             <<"/usr/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>),
  554: 
  555:             file:set_cwd(<<"/">>),
  556:             <<"/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>),
  557:             <<"/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>),
  558:             <<"/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang">>),
  559:             <<"/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang/src">>),
  560:             <<"/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang///src">>),
  561:             ok
  562:     end.
  563: 
  564: 
  565: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  566: 
  567: absname_bin_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  568:     case os:type() of
  569:         {win32, _} ->
  570:             [Drive|_] = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  571:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>, <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  572:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>,
  573:                                                             <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  574:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang">>, <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  575:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang/src">>,
  576:                                                           <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  577:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"\\erlang\\src">>,
  578:                                                           <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  579:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang">>,
  580:                                                            <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  581:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang/src">>,
  582:                                                                <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  583:             <<Drive:8,":/temp/erlang/src">> =
  584:                 filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang\\src\\">>, <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  585:             <<"a:/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"a:erlang">>, <<Drive:8,":/temp">>),
  586: 
  587:             file:set_cwd(<<Drive:8,":/">>),
  588:             <<Drive:8,":/foo">> = filename:absname(foo, <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  589:             <<Drive:8,":/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>, <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  590:             <<Drive:8,":/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>, <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  591:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang">>, <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  592:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang/src">>,
  593:                                                           <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  594:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"\\erlang\\\\src">>,
  595:                                                           <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  596:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang">>,
  597:                                                       <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  598:             <<Drive:8,":/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<Drive:8,":erlang/src">>,
  599:                                                           <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  600:             <<"a:/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"a:erlang">>, <<Drive:8,":/">>),
  601: 
  602:             ok;
  603:         _ ->
  604:             <<"/usr/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>, <<"/usr">>),
  605:             <<"/usr/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>, <<"/usr">>),
  606:             <<"/foo">> = filename:absname(<<"foo">>, <<"/">>),
  607:             <<"/../ebin">> = filename:absname(<<"../ebin">>, <<"/">>),
  608:             <<"/erlang">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang">>, <<"/">>),
  609:             <<"/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang/src">>, <<"/">>),
  610:             <<"/erlang/src">> = filename:absname(<<"/erlang///src">>, <<"/">>),
  611:             ok
  612:     end.
  613: 
  614: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  615: 
  616: basename_bin_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  617:     <<".">> = filename:basename(<<".">>),
  618:     <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"foo">>),
  619:     <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"/usr/foo">>),
  620:     <<"foo.erl">> = filename:basename(<<"A:usr/foo.erl">>),
  621:     case os:type() of
  622:         {win32, _} ->
  623:             <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"A:\\usr\\foo">>),
  624:             <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"A:foo">>);
  625:         _ ->
  626:             <<"strange\\but\\true">> = filename:basename(<<"strange\\but\\true">>)
  627:     end,
  628:     ok.
  629: 
  630: basename_bin_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  631:     <<".">> = filename:basename(<<".">>, <<".erl">>),
  632:     <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"foo.erl">>, <<".erl">>),
  633:     <<"foo.erl">> = filename:basename(<<"/usr/foo.erl">>, <<".hrl">>),
  634:     <<"foo.erl">> = filename:basename(<<"/usr.hrl/foo.erl">>, <<".hrl">>),
  635:     <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"/usr.hrl/foo">>, <<".hrl">>),
  636:     <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"usr/foo/">>, <<".erl">>),
  637:     <<"foo.erl">> = filename:basename(<<"usr/foo.erl/">>, <<".erl">>),
  638:     case os:type() of
  639:         {win32, _} ->
  640:             <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"A:foo">>, <<".erl">>),
  641:             <<"foo.erl">> = filename:basename(<<"a:\\usr\\foo.erl">>, <<".hrl">>),
  642:             <<"foo.erl">> = filename:basename(<<"c:\\usr.hrl\\foo.erl">>, <<".hrl">>),
  643:             <<"foo">> = filename:basename(<<"A:\\usr\\foo">>, <<".hrl">>);
  644:         _ ->
  645:             <<"strange\\but\\true">> =
  646:                 filename:basename(<<"strange\\but\\true.erl">>, <<".erl">>),
  647:             <<"strange\\but\\true">> =
  648:                 filename:basename(<<"strange\\but\\true">>, <<".erl">>)
  649:     end,
  650:     ok.
  651: 
  652: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  653: 
  654: dirname_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  655:     case os:type() of
  656:         {win32,_} ->
  657:             <<"A:/usr">> = filename:dirname(<<"A:/usr/foo.erl">>),
  658:             <<"A:usr">> = filename:dirname(<<"A:usr/foo.erl">>),
  659:             <<"/usr">> = filename:dirname(<<"\\usr\\foo.erl">>),
  660:             <<"/">> = filename:dirname(<<"\\usr">>),
  661:             <<"A:">> = filename:dirname(<<"A:">>);
  662:         _ -> true
  663:     end,
  664:     <<"usr">> = filename:dirname(<<"usr///foo.erl">>),
  665:     <<".">> = filename:dirname(<<"foo.erl">>),
  666:     <<".">> = filename:dirname(<<".">>),
  667:     <<"/">> = filename:dirname(<<"/">>),
  668:     <<"/">> = filename:dirname(<<"/usr">>),
  669:     ok.
  670: 
  671: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  672: 
  673: extension_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  674:     <<".erl">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/foo.erl">>),
  675:     <<".erl">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/foo.nisse.erl">>),
  676:     <<".erl">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr.bar/foo.nisse.erl">>),
  677:     <<"">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr.bar/foo">>),
  678:     <<"">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/foo">>),
  679:     <<"">> = filename:extension(<<".gitignore">>),
  680:     <<"">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/.gitignore">>),
  681:     <<".ignore">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/..ignore">>),
  682:     <<".ignore">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/.git.ignore">>),
  683:     case os:type() of
  684:         {win32, _} ->
  685:             <<"">> = filename:extension(<<"A:\\usr\\foo">>),
  686:             <<".erl">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr.bar/foo.nisse.erl">>),
  687:             <<"">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr.bar/foo">>),
  688:             <<"">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/.gitignore">>),
  689:             <<".ignore">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/..ignore">>),
  690:             <<".ignore">> = filename:extension(<<"A:/usr/.git.ignore">>),
  691:             ok;
  692:         _ -> ok
  693:     end.
  694: 
  695: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  696:     
  697: join_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  698:     <<"/">> = filename:join([<<"/">>]),
  699:     <<"usr/foo.erl">> = filename:join(<<"usr">>,<<"foo.erl">>),
  700:     <<"/src/foo.erl">> = filename:join(usr, <<"/src/foo.erl">>),
  701:     <<"/src/foo.erl">> = filename:join([<<"/src/">>,'foo.erl']),
  702:     <<"/src/foo.erl">> = filename:join(<<"usr">>, ["/sr", 'c/foo.erl']),
  703:     <<"/src/foo.erl">> = filename:join(<<"usr">>, <<"/src/foo.erl">>),
  704: 
  705:     %% Make sure that redundant slashes work too.
  706:     <<"a/b/c/d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b/c/////d//e/f/g">>]),
  707:     <<"a/b/c/d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b/c/">>, <<"d//e/f/g">>]),
  708:     <<"a/b/c/d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b/c">>, <<"d//e/f/g">>]),
  709:     <<"/d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b/c">>, <<"/d//e/f/g">>]),
  710: 
  711:     <<"foo/bar">> = filename:join([$f,$o,$o,$/,[]], <<"bar">>),
  712: 
  713:     %% Single dots - should be removed if in the middle of the path,
  714:     %% but not at the end of the path.
  715:     %% Also test equivalence between join/1 and join/2 (OTP-12158)
  716:     <<"/.">> = filename:join([<<"/.">>]),
  717:     <<"/">> = filename:join([<<"/./">>]),
  718:     <<"/.">> = filename:join([<<"/./.">>]),
  719:     <<"./.">> = filename:join([<<"./.">>]),
  720: 
  721:     <<"/a/b">> = filename:join([<<"/a/.">>,<<"b">>]),
  722:     <<"/a/b">> = filename:join(<<"/a/.">>,<<"b">>),
  723: 
  724:     <<"/a/b/.">> = filename:join([<<"/a/.">>,<<"b/.">>]),
  725:     <<"/a/b/.">> = filename:join(<<"/a/.">>,<<"b/.">>),
  726: 
  727:     <<"/a/.">> = filename:join([<<"/a/.">>,<<".">>]),
  728:     <<"/a/.">> = filename:join(<<"/a/.">>,<<".">>),
  729: 
  730:     <<"/a/.">> = filename:join([<<"/a">>,<<".">>]),
  731:     <<"/a/.">> = filename:join(<<"/a">>,<<".">>),
  732: 
  733:     <<"/a/.">> = filename:join([<<"/a/.">>,<<"">>]),
  734:     <<"/a/.">> = filename:join(<<"/a/.">>,<<"">>),
  735: 
  736:     <<"./.">> = filename:join([<<"./.">>,<<".">>]),
  737:     <<"./.">> = filename:join(<<"./.">>,<<".">>),
  738: 
  739:     <<"./.">> = filename:join([<<"./">>,<<".">>]),
  740:     <<"./.">> = filename:join(<<"./">>,<<".">>),
  741: 
  742:     <<"./.">> = filename:join([<<"./.">>,<<"">>]),
  743:     <<"./.">> = filename:join(<<"./.">>,<<"">>),
  744: 
  745:     <<".">> = filename:join([<<".">>,<<"">>]),
  746:     <<".">> = filename:join(<<".">>,<<"">>),
  747: 
  748:     <<"./.">> = filename:join([<<".">>,<<".">>]),
  749:     <<"./.">> = filename:join(<<".">>,<<".">>),
  750: 
  751:     %% Trailing slash shall be removed - except the root
  752:     <<"/">> = filename:join([<<"/">>]),
  753:     <<"/">> = filename:join([<<"/./">>]),
  754:     <<"/a">> = filename:join([<<"/a/">>]),
  755:     <<"/b">> = filename:join([<<"/a/">>,<<"/b/">>]),
  756:     <<"/b">> = filename:join(<<"/a/">>,<<"/b/">>),
  757:     <<"/a/b">> = filename:join([<<"/a/">>,<<"b/">>]),
  758:     <<"/a/b">> = filename:join(<<"/a/">>,<<"b/">>),
  759: 
  760:     case os:type() of
  761:         {win32, _} ->
  762:             <<"//">> = filename:join([<<"//">>]),
  763:             <<"d:/">> = filename:join([<<"D:/">>]),
  764:             <<"d:/">> = filename:join([<<"D:\\">>]),
  765:             <<"d:/abc">> = filename:join([<<"D:/">>, <<"abc">>]),
  766:             <<"d:abc">> = filename:join([<<"D:">>, <<"abc">>]),
  767:             <<"a/b/c/d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b\\c//\\/\\d/\\e/f\\g">>]),
  768:             <<"a:usr/foo.erl">> = filename:join([<<"A:">>,<<"usr">>,<<"foo.erl">>]),
  769:             <<"/usr/foo.erl">> = filename:join([<<"A:">>,<<"/usr">>,<<"foo.erl">>]),
  770:             <<"c:usr">> = filename:join(<<"A:">>,<<"C:usr">>),
  771:             <<"a:usr">> = filename:join(<<"A:">>,<<"usr">>),
  772:             <<"c:/usr">> = filename:join(<<"A:">>, <<"C:/usr">>),
  773:             <<"c:/usr/foo.erl">> = filename:join([<<"A:">>,<<"C:/usr">>,<<"foo.erl">>]),
  774:             <<"c:usr/foo.erl">> = filename:join([<<"A:">>,<<"C:usr">>,<<"foo.erl">>]),
  775:             <<"d:/foo">> = filename:join([$D, $:, $/, []], <<"foo">>),
  776:             <<"//">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\">>, <<"">>),
  777:             <<"//foo">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\">>, <<"foo">>),
  778:             <<"//foo/bar">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\">>, <<"foo\\\\bar">>),
  779:             <<"//foo/bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo">>, <<"bar\\\\baz">>),
  780:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo">>, <<"\\\\bar\\baz">>),
  781:             <<"//foo/bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo\\bar">>, baz),
  782:             <<"//foo/\bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo/\bar">>, baz),
  783:             <<"//foo/bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo/bar">>, baz),
  784:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo">>, <<"\\\\bar\\baz">>),
  785:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo">>, <<"//bar\\baz">>),
  786:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo">>, <<"//bar/baz">>),
  787:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"\\\\foo">>, <<"\\\\bar/baz">>),
  788:             <<"//d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b/c">>, <<"//d//e/f/g">>]),
  789:             <<"//">> = filename:join(<<"//">>, <<"">>),
  790:             <<"//foo">> = filename:join(<<"//">>, <<"foo">>),
  791:             <<"//foo/bar">> = filename:join(<<"//">>, <<"foo\\\\bar">>),
  792:             <<"//foo/bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo">>, <<"bar\\\\baz">>),
  793:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo">>, <<"\\\\bar\\baz">>),
  794:             <<"//foo/bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo\\bar">>, baz),
  795:             <<"//foo/\bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo/\bar">>, baz),
  796:             <<"//foo/bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo/bar">>, baz),
  797:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo">>, <<"\\\\bar\\baz">>),
  798:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo">>, <<"//bar\\baz">>),
  799:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo">>, <<"//bar/baz">>),
  800:             <<"//bar/baz">> = filename:join(<<"//foo">>, <<"\\\\bar/baz">>),
  801:             ok;
  802:         _ ->
  803:             <<"/">> = filename:join([<<"//">>]),
  804:             <<"/d/e/f/g">> = filename:join([<<"a//b/c">>, <<"//d//e/f/g">>]),
  805:             ok
  806:     end.
  807: 
  808: pathtype_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  809:     relative = filename:pathtype(<<"..">>),
  810:     relative = filename:pathtype(<<"foo">>),
  811:     relative = filename:pathtype(<<"foo/bar">>),
  812:     relative = filename:pathtype('foo/bar'),
  813:     case os:type() of
  814:         {win32, _} ->
  815:             volumerelative = filename:pathtype(<<"/usr/local/bin">>),
  816:             volumerelative = filename:pathtype(<<"A:usr/local/bin">>),
  817:             ok;
  818:         _ ->
  819:             absolute = filename:pathtype(<<"/">>),
  820:             absolute = filename:pathtype(<<"/usr/local/bin">>),
  821:             ok
  822:     end.
  823: 
  824: rootname_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  825:     <<"/jam.src/kalle">> = filename:rootname(<<"/jam.src/kalle">>),
  826:     <<"/jam.src/foo">> = filename:rootname(<<"/jam.src/foo.erl">>),
  827:     <<"/jam.src/foo">> = filename:rootname(<<"/jam.src/foo.erl">>, <<".erl">>),
  828:     <<"/jam.src/foo.jam">> = filename:rootname(<<"/jam.src/foo.jam">>, <<".erl">>),
  829:     <<"/jam.src/foo.jam">> = filename:rootname(["/jam.sr",'c/foo.j',"am"],<<".erl">>),
  830:     <<"/jam.src/foo.jam">> = filename:rootname(["/jam.sr",'c/foo.j'|am],<<".erl">>),
  831:     ok.
  832: 
  833: split_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  834:     [<<"/">>,<<"usr">>,<<"local">>,<<"bin">>] = filename:split(<<"/usr/local/bin">>),
  835:     [<<"foo">>,<<"bar">>]= filename:split(<<"foo/bar">>),
  836:     [<<"foo">>, <<"bar">>, <<"hello">>]= filename:split(<<"foo////bar//hello">>),
  837:     [<<"/">>] = filename:split(<<"/">>),
  838:     [] = filename:split(<<"">>),
  839:     case os:type() of
  840:         {win32,_} ->
  841:             [<<"a:/">>,<<"msdev">>,<<"include">>] =
  842:                 filename:split(<<"a:/msdev/include">>),
  843:             [<<"a:/">>,<<"msdev">>,<<"include">>] =
  844:                 filename:split(<<"A:/msdev/include">>),
  845:             [<<"msdev">>,<<"include">>] =
  846:                 filename:split(<<"msdev\\include">>),
  847:             [<<"a:/">>,<<"msdev">>,<<"include">>] =
  848:                 filename:split(<<"a:\\msdev\\include">>),
  849:             [<<"a:">>,<<"msdev">>,<<"include">>] =
  850:                 filename:split(<<"a:msdev\\include">>),
  851:             [<<"//">>,<<"foo">>] =
  852:                 filename:split(<<"\\\\foo">>),
  853:             [<<"//">>,<<"foo">>] =
  854:                 filename:split(<<"//foo">>),
  855:             [<<"//">>,<<"foo">>,<<"bar">>] =
  856:                 filename:split(<<"\\\\foo\\\\bar">>),
  857:             [<<"//">>,<<"foo">>,<<"baz">>] =
  858:                 filename:split(<<"\\\\foo\\baz">>),
  859:             [<<"//">>,<<"foo">>,<<"baz">>] =
  860:                 filename:split(<<"//foo\\baz">>),
  861:             ok;
  862:         _ ->
  863:             ok
  864:     end.
  865: 
  866: t_nativename_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  867:     <<"abcedf">> = filename:nativename(<<"abcedf">>),
  868:     case os:type() of
  869:         {win32, _} ->
  870:             <<"a:\\temp\\arne.exe">> =
  871:                 filename:nativename(<<"A:/temp//arne.exe/">>);
  872:         _ ->
  873:             <<"/usr/tmp/arne">> =
  874:                 filename:nativename(<<"/usr/tmp//arne/">>)
  875:     end.
  876: 
  877: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  878: %% basedirs
  879: t_basedir_api(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  880:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(site_data, "My App")),
  881:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(site_config, "My App")),
  882:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_data, "My App")),
  883:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_log, "My App")),
  884:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App")),
  885:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_cache, "My App")),
  886: 
  887:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(site_data, <<"My App">>)),
  888:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(site_config, <<"My App">>)),
  889:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_data, <<"My App">>)),
  890:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_log, <<"My App">>)),
  891:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_config, <<"My App">>)),
  892:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_cache, <<"My App">>)),
  893: 
  894:     %% simulate for windows
  895:     case os:type() of
  896:         {win32,_} -> ok;
  897:         _ ->
  898:             os:putenv("APPDATA", "C:\\Documents and Settings\\otptest\\Application Data")
  899:     end,
  900: 
  901:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(site_data, "My App", #{})),
  902:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(site_config, "My App", #{os=>linux})),
  903:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_data, "My App", #{os=>darwin})),
  904:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_log, "My App", #{os=>windows})),
  905:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{author=>"Erl"})),
  906:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{os=>darwin,
  907:                                                             author=>"Erl"})),
  908:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{os=>linux,
  909:                                                             author=>"Erl"})),
  910:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_cache, "My App",#{os=>windows,
  911:                                                            author=>"Erl"})),
  912:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{os=>darwin,
  913:                                                             author=>"Erla",
  914:                                                             version=>"1.0"})),
  915:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{os=>linux,
  916:                                                             version=>"2.0.1",
  917:                                                             author=>"Erl"})),
  918:     true = is_list(filename:basedir(user_cache, "My App",#{os=>windows,
  919:                                                            version=>"3.1.2",
  920:                                                            author=>"Erl"})),
  921:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{os=>darwin,
  922:                                                               author=>"Erla",
  923:                                                               version=><<"1.0">>})),
  924:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_config, "My App",#{os=>windows,
  925:                                                               version=>"2.0.1",
  926:                                                               author=><<"Erl">>})),
  927:     true = is_binary(filename:basedir(user_cache, "My App",#{os=>linux,
  928:                                                              version=><<"3.1.2">>,
  929:                                                              author=>"Erl"})),
  930:     %% simulate for windows
  931:     case os:type() of
  932:         {win32,_} -> ok;
  933:         _ -> os:unsetenv("APPDATA")
  934:     end,
  935: 
  936:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch filename:basedir(wrong_config, "My App")),
  937:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch filename:basedir(user_cache, {bad,name})),
  938:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch filename:basedir(user_cache, "My App", badopts)),
  939:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch filename:basedir(user_cache, "My App", [])),
  940:     ok.
  941: 
  942: t_basedir_windows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  943:     Types = [user_data,user_log,user_config,user_cache],
  944:     case os:type() of
  945:         {win32,_} ->
  946:             ok = check_basedir_windows(Types, #{});
  947:         _ ->
  948:             %% Windows 7 and beyond
  949:             os:putenv("APPDATA", "C:\\Users\\otptest\\AppData\\Roaming"),
  950:             os:putenv("LOCALAPPDATA", "C:\\Users\\otptest\\AppData\\Local"),
  951:             io:format("APPDATA ~p~n", [os:getenv("APPDATA")]),
  952:             io:format("LOCALAPPDATA ~p~n", [os:getenv("LOCALAPPDATA")]),
  953:             ok = check_basedir_windows(Types,#{os=>windows}),
  954:             %% Windows XP
  955:             os:unsetenv("LOCALAPPDATA"),
  956:             os:putenv("APPDATA", "C:\\Documents and Settings\\otptest\\Application Data"),
  957:             io:format("APPDATA ~p~n", [os:getenv("APPDATA")]),
  958:             io:format("APPLOCALDATA ~p~n", [os:getenv("APPLOCALDATA")]),
  959:             ok = check_basedir_windows(Types,#{os=>windows}),
  960:             os:unsetenv("APPDATA")
  961:     end,
  962:     ok.
  963: 
  964: check_basedir_windows([],_) -> ok;
  965: check_basedir_windows([Type|Types],Opt) ->
  966:     Name = "Some Application",
  967:     io:format("type: ~p~n", [Type]),
  968:     ok = check_basedir_windows_path(Type,
  969:                                     [Name],
  970:                                     filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt)),
  971:     ok = check_basedir_windows_path(Type,
  972:                                     ["Erl",Name],
  973:                                     filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt#{author=>"Erl"})),
  974:     ok = check_basedir_windows_path(Type,
  975:                                     [Name,"1.0"],
  976:                                     filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt#{version=>"1.0"})),
  977:     ok = check_basedir_windows_path(Type,
  978:                                     ["Erl",Name,"1.0"],
  979:                                     filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt#{author=>"Erl",
  980:                                                                       version=>"1.0"})),
  981:     check_basedir_windows(Types, Opt).
  982: 
  983: check_basedir_windows_path(Type,Check0,Basedir) ->
  984:     BDR = lists:reverse(filename:split(Basedir)),
  985:     Check = lists:reverse(Check0),
  986:     io:format("~w: ~p ~p~n", [Type,Check,BDR]),
  987:     case Type of
  988:         user_log -> check_basedir_windows_path_split(["Logs"|Check],BDR);
  989:         user_cache -> check_basedir_windows_path_split(["Cache"|Check],BDR);
  990:         _ -> check_basedir_windows_path_split(Check,BDR)
  991:     end.
  992: 
  993: check_basedir_windows_path_split([],_) -> ok;
  994: check_basedir_windows_path_split([Same|Check],[Same|BDR]) ->
  995:     check_basedir_windows_path_split(Check,BDR).
  996: 
  997: 
  998: t_basedir_xdg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  999:     check_basedir_xdg([user_data,user_log,user_config,user_cache,
 1000:                        site_data,site_config]),
 1001:     ok.
 1002: 
 1003: check_basedir_xdg([]) -> ok;
 1004: check_basedir_xdg([Type|Types]) ->
 1005:     Name = "some_app",
 1006:     Opt  = #{os=>linux},
 1007:     Key  = basedir_xdg_env(Type),
 1008:     io:format("type: ~p~n", [Type]),
 1009:     Home = case os:getenv("WSLENV") of
 1010:                false -> os:getenv("HOME");
 1011:                _ -> os:getenv("USERPROFILE")
 1012:            end,
 1013:     NDir = "/some/absolute/path",
 1014:     DefPath = basedir_xdg_def(Type,Home,Name),
 1015:     EnvPath = case Type of
 1016:                   user_log    -> filename:join([NDir,Name,"log"]);
 1017:                   site_data   -> [filename:join([NDir,Name])];
 1018:                   site_config -> [filename:join([NDir,Name])];
 1019:                   _           -> filename:join([NDir,Name])
 1020:               end,
 1021:     os:unsetenv(Key),
 1022:     ok = check_basedir(Type, DefPath, filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt)),
 1023:     os:putenv(Key, NDir),
 1024:     ok = check_basedir(Type, EnvPath, filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt)),
 1025:     os:unsetenv(Key),
 1026:     ok = check_basedir(Type, DefPath, filename:basedir(Type, Name, Opt)),
 1027:     check_basedir_xdg(Types).
 1028: 
 1029: check_basedir(Type, Path, Basedir) ->
 1030:     io:format("~w: ~p = ~p~n", [Type,Path,Basedir]),
 1031:     Path = Basedir,
 1032:     ok.
 1033: 
 1034: basedir_xdg_env(Type) ->
 1035:     case Type of
 1036:         user_data   -> "XDG_DATA_HOME";
 1037:         user_config -> "XDG_CONFIG_HOME";
 1038:         user_cache  -> "XDG_CACHE_HOME";
 1039:         user_log    -> "XDG_CACHE_HOME";
 1040:         site_data   -> "XDG_DATA_DIRS";
 1041:         site_config -> "XDG_CONFIG_DIRS"
 1042:     end.
 1043: 
 1044: basedir_xdg_def(Type,Home,Name) ->
 1045:     case Type of
 1046:         user_data   -> filename:join([Home,".local","share",Name]);
 1047:         user_config -> filename:join([Home,".config",Name]);
 1048:         user_cache  -> filename:join([Home,".cache",Name]);
 1049:         user_log    -> filename:join([Home,".cache",Name,"log"]);
 1050:         site_data   -> [filename:join([Dir,Name]) ||
 1051:                         Dir <- ["/usr/local/share/","/usr/share/"]];
 1052:         site_config -> [filename:join(["/etc/xdg",Name])]
 1053:     end.
